Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express, #121 Union/Streeterville Express Temporary Reroute at Lower Wacker/Orleans
ShortDescription: 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express, 121 Union/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express, #121 Union/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Illinois due to street blockage near Lower Wacker/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute at Wentworth/29th
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 31st, Canal, 29th, Canal, 26th and Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/29th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wentworth, 31st, Canal, 29th, Canal, 26th and Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/29th.

Allow extra travel time.
